Class ShapeVisualManager

Manages the visual representation of shape elements on the canvas.

public class ShapeVisualManager

Remarks

ShapeVisualManager follows the same pattern as NodeVisualManager and EdgeVisualManager, providing consistent management of visual-to-model mappings for shape elements.

It handles: - Creating visuals for shape elements - Positioning visuals in canvas coordinates - Updating visuals when properties change - Removing visuals when shapes are removed
